titleStmt.title: [A brief treatise containing the most strange and horrible cruelty of Elizabeth Stile alias Rockingham and her confederates, executed at Abingdon, upon R. Galis]
titleStmt.author: Galis, Richard.

titleStmt.title: [A brief treatise containing the most strange and horrible cruelty of Elizabeth Stile alias Rockingham and her confederates, executed at Abingdon, upon R. Galis]
titleStmt.author: Galis, Richard.

notesStmt.note: This is Galis' own account and a different work from STC 23267--STC.
Imprint from STC; Entered to J. Allde 4 May, 1579 in Stationer's Register.
Headlines B2v to end: 'Witches at / Windesor'.
Caption title on A4r: The first attempt of Elizabeth Stile alias Mother Rockingam and her confederates ...
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library, Oxford, England.
